A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: George Lucas did a amazing job long ago with a limited budget because he is brilliant. Disney is doing a very poor job unfortunately for millions of fans... I had hope for Episode 8 to be better than Episode 7 but it was worse. Many plot holes. Bad humor... how can you make Star Wars cheesy and corny?!!? Humor in Star Wars was great (Han Solo)...\nForced diversified cast. I have nothing against it\, it just feel forced which is sad. Characters lack to be interesting.\nBest part of this movie was the Asian woman that did a good job. Those movies are very bad compare to the initial trilogy where we had amazing plot and lot of great characters. I do not have any hope for Episode 9. Perhaps more stories like Rogue One and Han Solo will provide good content to fans.
